code: import dayjs from"dayjs";export function getMonth(){var month=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:dayjs().month();month=Math.floor(month);var year=dayjs().year();var firstDayOfTheMonth=dayjs(new Date(year,month,0)).day();var currentMonthCount=0-firstDayOfTheMonth;var daysMatrix=new Array(5).fill([]).map(function(){return new Array(7).fill(null).map(function(){currentMonthCount++;return dayjs(new Date(year,month,currentMonthCount));});});return daysMatrix;}
